failed_criteria: Glass on doors is free of heavy dirt or debris; minor reflections or cash4you related promotional signage are acceptable.
safety, legal compliance, or accessibility stickers/signage (such as “Automatic Caution Door” or ADA decals) are permitted on the door; tape residue is acceptable if it does not impede visibility.
action_plan: Thoroughly clean the glass door to remove all heavy dirt and tape residue; ensure the surface is clear and free of debris.
Remove or replace tape residue near signage to restore full visibility through the door glass.
visual_feedback: Heavy tape residue covering central and lower portions of the glass door, impeding clear visibility through the door.
Large areas of dirt and adhesive residue visible around the door edges, failing the clean-glass requirement.
